alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Dickson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:29PM CDT until July 08 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dickson County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 329 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of White Bluff, or 8 miles west of Ashland City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ashland City, White Bluff, Kingston Springs and Pegram. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 187 and 189. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
